title: Explain Bosses of the Senate image

content.description:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

Joseph Keppler, “The Bosses of the Senate,” 1889

Courtesy of the United States Senate Collection
content.question:
Using the image, respond to parts a, b, and c.

Briefly describe one point of view by the artist expressed in the image.

Briefly explain how one historical development from 1865 to 1889 led to the situation depicted in the image.

Briefly explain how one historical development from 1890 to 1920 resulted from the point of view expressed in the image.

frqParts.text:
Using the image, respond to parts a, b, and c.

Briefly describe one point of view by the artist expressed in the image.

Briefly explain how one historical development from 1865 to 1889 led to the situation depicted in the image.

Briefly explain how one historical development from 1890 to 1920 resulted from the point of view expressed in the image.

topic.text: 6.12: Controversies over the Role of Government in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
